name: netto
desc: Netto

name: Builder
desc: Base builder abstraction that wires routes into the shared radix tree.

name: Builder.new
desc: Creates a builder bound to the shared RadixTree and optional parent.

name: add
desc: Registers a handler for an HTTP verb at route.

name: connect
desc: Registers a CONNECT handler.

name: delete
desc: Registers a DELETE handler.

name: file
desc: Serves a single file located at filePath under the route path.

name: get
desc: Registers a GET handler.

name: group
desc: Creates a nested route group optionally scoped by prefix and middleware.

name: head
desc: Registers a HEAD handler.

name: middleware
desc: Effective middleware chain for this builder including ancestors.

name: options
desc: Registers an OPTIONS handler.

name: patch
desc: Registers a PATCH handler.

name: post
desc: Registers a POST handler.

name: put
desc: Registers a PUT handler.

name: rTree
desc: Shared radix tree storing every registered route for this builder chain.

name: redirect
desc: Convenience for responding with a 301 redirect from route to redirect.

name: static
desc: Exposes every file under root through routes prefixed by prefix.

name: trace
desc: Registers a TRACE handler.

name: use
desc: Adds middleware to the group or router, composing with existing ones.

name: Ctx
desc: Request context shared between middleware and handlers.

name: Ctx.new
desc: Creates a context wrapper for an HttpRequest and related response.

name: contains
desc: Whether a value exists for key.

name: extras
desc: Mutable bag for sharing data between middleware and handlers.

name: get
desc: Retrieves a typed value for key if present.

name: getOrPut
desc: Returns a typed value for key, computing and storing it when absent.

name: remove
desc: Removes and returns the value stored at key.

name: request
desc: Encapsulated HTTP request with helpers and shared extras.

name: require
desc: Retrieves a typed value for key or throws if it is missing.

name: response
desc: Response helper tied to the current request lifecycle.

name: set
desc: Stores value under key.

name: CtxRequest
desc:
Wrapper around HttpRequest offering convenient access to request data
and the shared contextual extras map.

name: CtxRequest.new
desc: Creates a wrapper around the incoming HttpRequest.

name: accepts
desc: Returns true if the Accept header allows the provided mime type.

name: bestMatch
desc:
Returns the best match from mimes based on Accept (very small impl).
If no Accept header, returns the first offered.

name: body
desc: Helper exposing lazy parsing utilities for the request body.

name: canHijack
desc: Whether this request can currently be hijacked.

name: contentLength
desc: Declared content length of the request, if known.

name: contentType
desc: Parsed content type header.

name: cookie
desc: Looks up a cookie value by name, if present.

name: cookies
desc: Parsed cookies (first value wins on duplicate names).

name: header
desc: First value of a header (case-insensitive) or null.

name: headers
desc: Lowercased header names; values are unmodifiable lists.

name: hijack
desc: Hands control of the underlying HttpRequest to callback.

name: host
desc: Value of the Host header, if provided.

name: isHijacked
desc: Whether the request has already been hijacked.

name: isHttps
desc: Whether the request is served over HTTPS (directly or inferred).

name: method
desc: HTTP method of the incoming request.

name: path
desc: Path component of the request URI.

name: pathParameter
desc:
Retrieves a path parameter based on a key.
In case, no path parameter is available, it returns an empty string.

name: pathParameters
desc: Populated by the router via updatePathParameters.

name: queryParameters
desc: All query parameters with all values preserved.

name: raw
desc: Access to the underlying HttpRequest.

name: remoteAddress
desc: Remote address associated with the underlying socket, if available.

name: uri
desc: Full request URI including query parameters.

name: userAgent
desc: Reported user agent string, if provided.

name: CtxResponse
desc:
Response helper that tracks outgoing data and exposes the shared extras
map used by middleware and handlers.

name: CtxResponse.new
desc: Creates a response helper bound to the provided HttpRequest.

name: badRequest
desc: Sends a 400 Bad Request response with an optional message.

name: bodyLength
desc: Returns the length of the buffered response body, if any.

name: bytes
desc: Sends a binary body optionally overriding status and content type.

name: conflict
desc: Sends a 409 Conflict response with an optional message.

name: created
desc:
201 Created with optional body and Location header.
Provide either jsonBody or textBody, not both.

name: finalize
desc: Flushes pending headers/body to the underlying HttpResponse.

name: forbidden
desc: Sends a 403 Forbidden response with an optional message.

name: found
desc: Sends a 302 redirect to location.

name: gone
desc: Sends a 410 Gone response with an optional message.

name: headers
desc: Mutable headers for the pending response.

name: html
desc: Sends an HTML body encoded with enc.

name: internalServerError
desc: Sends a 500 Internal Server Error response with an optional message.

name: isBodySuppressed
desc: Whether the response body will be omitted when finalized.

name: isCommitted
desc: Whether the underlying HttpResponse has already been written to.

name: json
desc: Serializes data as JSON and sends it with the provided status.

name: movedPermanently
desc: Sends a 301 redirect to location.

name: noContent
desc: Sends a 204 response with no body.

name: notFound
desc: Sends a 404 Not Found response with an optional message.

name: permanentRedirect
desc: Sends a 308 redirect to location.

name: redirect
desc: Generic redirect helper. Defaults to 302 Found.

name: seeOther
desc: Sends a 303 redirect to location.

name: setCookie
desc: Adds a Cookie to the current HTTP response.

name: status
desc: Updates the HTTP status code for the pending response.

name: statusCode
desc: Status code that will be sent when the response is finalized.

name: stream
desc: Streams an arbitrary byte source directly to the client.

name: string
desc: Sends a plain-text body encoded with enc.

name: temporaryRedirect
desc: Sends a 307 redirect to location.

name: unauthorized
desc: Sends a 401 Unauthorized response with an optional message.

name: CustomTagCallback
desc: Produces a custom tag value for the serialized log output.

name: ErrorHandler
desc: Signature for error handlers triggered by uncaught HttpExceptions.

name: FormData
desc: Aggregated multipart form result.

name: FormData.new
desc: Creates an aggregate of parsed multipart form fields and uploaded files.

name: addField
desc: Adds value to the list of values for name.

name: fields
desc: Text fields: name â†’ list of values (multi-value support).

name: files
desc: Uploaded files.

name: Group
desc: Route builder that scopes nested routes under a shared prefix and middleware.

name: Group.new
desc: Creates a nested builder with an optional prefix and middleware.

name: add
desc: Registers a handler inside the group's prefix.

name: group
desc: Creates a nested group preserving the full prefix chain.

name: prefix
desc: Normalized prefix applied to every route within the group.

name: Handler
desc: Signature for route handlers.

name: HijackException
desc: Internal sentinel exception thrown once a request has been hijacked.

name: HijackException.new
desc: Creates a new sentinel exception for hijacked requests.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: HttpException
desc: Minimal HTTP exception hierarchy with common helpers.

name: HttpException.new
desc: Creates a generic HttpException with the provided status and message.

name: badRequest
desc: A convenience constructor for 400 Bad Request errors.

name: conflict
desc: A convenience constructor for 409 Conflict errors.

name: forbidden
desc: A convenience constructor for 403 Forbidden errors.

name: internalServerError
desc: A convenience constructor for 500 Internal Server Error errors.

name: message
desc: Human-readable description of the error.

name: meta
desc: Optional metadata associated with the error.

name: methodNotAllowed
desc: A convenience constructor for 405 Method Not Allowed errors.

name: notFound
desc: A convenience constructor for 404 Not Found errors.

name: payloadTooLarge
desc: A convenience constructor for 413 Payload Too Large errors.

name: stackTrace
desc: Captured stack trace at instantiation time.

name: status
desc: Status code associated with this HTTP exception.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: unauthorized
desc: A convenience constructor for 401 Unauthorized errors.

name: unprocessableEntity
desc: A convenience constructor for 422 Unprocessable Entity errors.

name: unsupportedMediaType
desc: A convenience constructor for 415 Unsupported Media Type errors.

name: HttpExceptionBadRequest
desc: 400 Bad Request.

name: HttpExceptionBadRequest.new
desc: Creates a 400 Bad Request exception.

name: HttpExceptionConflict
desc: 409 Conflict.

name: HttpExceptionConflict.new
desc: Creates a 409 Conflict exception.

name: HttpExceptionForbidden
desc: 403 Forbidden.

name: HttpExceptionForbidden.new
desc: Creates a 403 Forbidden exception.

name: HttpExceptionInternalServerError
desc: 500 Internal Server Error.

name: HttpExceptionInternalServerError.new
desc: Creates a 500 Internal Server Error exception.

name: HttpExceptionMethodNotAllowed
desc: 405 Method Not Allowed.

name: HttpExceptionMethodNotAllowed.new
desc: Creates a 405 Method Not Allowed exception.

name: HttpExceptionNotFound
desc: 404 Not Found.

name: HttpExceptionNotFound.new
desc: Creates a 404 Not Found exception.

name: HttpExceptionPayloadTooLarge
desc: 413 Payload Too Large.

name: HttpExceptionPayloadTooLarge.new
desc: Creates a 413 Payload Too Large exception.

name: HttpExceptionUnauthorized
desc: 401 Unauthorized.

name: HttpExceptionUnauthorized.new
desc: Creates a 401 Unauthorized exception.

name: HttpExceptionUnprocessableEntity
desc: 422 Unprocessable Entity.

name: HttpExceptionUnprocessableEntity.new
desc: Creates a 422 Unprocessable Entity exception.

name: HttpExceptionUnsupportedMediaType
desc: 415 Unsupported Media Type.

name: HttpExceptionUnsupportedMediaType.new
desc: Creates a 415 Unsupported Media Type exception.

name: HttpExceptionWithStatus
desc: A generic HttpException for an arbitrary status code.

name: HttpExceptionWithStatus.new
desc: Creates an exception representing an arbitrary HTTP status code.

name: LogSkipper
desc: Callback that decides whether logging should be skipped for the request.

name: LoggerConfig
desc: Configuration object for the structured logging middleware.

name: LoggerConfig.new
desc: Creates logging middleware configuration with optional overrides.

name: customTag
desc: Hook for injecting additional structured data.

name: customTimeFormat
desc: Formatting pattern used by the time_custom tag.

name: format
desc: Template used to render the log message.

name: level
desc: Minimum level required for a message to be emitted.

name: logger
desc: The Logger instance that receives the log message.

name: now
desc: Clock function used for latency calculation and timestamp rendering.

name: skipper
desc: Predicate that determines whether to skip logging for the request.

name: LoggerEvent
desc: Immutable snapshot of request/response metadata passed to formatting hooks.

name: bytesIn
desc: Bytes reported as incoming (may be null for chunked requests).

name: bytesOut
desc: Bytes written to the response.

name: ctx
desc: Context for the in-flight request.

name: end
desc: Timestamp captured after the handler completes.

name: error
desc: Error thrown by the handler, if any.

name: latency
desc: Duration between start and end.

name: request
desc: Underlying HttpRequest for additional inspection.

name: response
desc: Wrapped response helper associated with the request.

name: stackTrace
desc: Stack trace associated with error.

name: start
desc: Timestamp captured before invoking the handler.

name: status
desc: Response status code observed when logging.

name: Middleware
desc: Signature for middleware that transforms a downstream Handler.

name: MiddlewareExtensions
desc: Extensions on Middleware to aid in composing Middleware and Handlers.

name: addMiddleware
desc: Merges this and other into a new Middleware.

name: MultipartLimits
desc: Limits for multipart processing. All fields are optional.

name: MultipartLimits.new
desc: Creates a new configuration describing multipart parsing limits.

name: maxFieldLength
desc: Maximum length for each individual field value.

name: maxFields
desc: Maximum number of non-file fields allowed.

name: maxFileSize
desc: Maximum size for any single uploaded file.

name: maxFiles
desc: Maximum number of uploaded files.

name: maxTotalSize
desc: Maximum cumulative size for all fields and files.

name: Netto
desc: Primary entry-point combining router, middleware, and server integration.

name: Netto.new
desc: Creates a Netto application with a fresh router instance.

name: add
desc: Registers a handler for an HTTP verb at route.

name: call
desc: Dispatches an incoming request to the matching route.

name: connect
desc: Registers a CONNECT handler.

name: delete
desc: Registers a DELETE handler.

name: errorHandler
desc: Handler executed when an uncaught HttpException escapes a route.

name: file
desc: Serves a single file located at filePath under the route path.

name: get
desc: Registers a GET handler.

name: group
desc: Creates a sub-router with optional prefix and middleware.

name: head
desc: Registers a HEAD handler.

name: middleware
desc: Root middleware chain applied to every request.

name: notFoundHandler
desc: Handler executed when no route matches.

name: options
desc: Registers an OPTIONS handler.

name: patch
desc: Registers a PATCH handler.

name: post
desc: Registers a POST handler.

name: put
desc: Registers a PUT handler.

name: router
desc: Root router instance used to register routes and middleware.

name: serve
desc: Spins up an HttpServer that delegates requests to this instance.

name: static
desc: Serves every file under root through routes prefixed by prefix.

name: trace
desc: Registers a TRACE handler.

name: use
desc: Adds router-level middleware.

name: RadixNode
desc: Node used by the radix tree to store path segments and route metadata.

name: RadixNode.new
desc: Creates a node storing prefix and an optional value.

name: isParam
desc: Whether this node represents a parameter segment.

name: RadixResult
desc: Result returned when resolving a path through the radix tree.

name: RadixResult.new
desc: Creates a lookup result with the matched value and params.

name: params
desc: Captured path parameters keyed by name.

name: value
desc: Matched value stored for the node.

name: RadixTree
desc: Lightweight radix tree optimized for HTTP route lookup.

name: get
desc: Retrieves the value associated with path, including path params.

name: getLongestLiteralMatch
desc: Finds the deepest literal match for path ignoring parameters.

name: getTreeString
desc: Returns a human-readable tree representation (useful in debugging).

name: insert
desc: Inserts value under the normalized path.

name: matchFirstSegments
desc: Returns the set of first-level segments that match path.

name: RouteNode
desc: Holds the handler and middleware context for a concrete route.

name: RouteNode.new
desc: Creates a route node bound to a handler and originating builder.

name: builder
desc: Builder that produced the route, used to access middleware.

name: handler
desc: Handler registered for the route.

name: invoke
desc: Executes the handler associated with the route using ctx and params.

name: Router
desc: HTTP router based on a radix tree with middleware support.

name: Router.new
desc: Creates an empty router backed by a RadixTree.

name: allowedMethods
desc: Returns the list of methods available for path (useful for 405 handling).

name: resolve
desc: Resolves method and path to a route node along with extracted params.

name: UploadedFile
desc: A streamed uploaded file backed by a temporary file on disk.

name: UploadedFile.new
desc: Creates a view over an uploaded file persisted to a temporary file.

name: contentType
desc: Content type provided for the upload.

name: delete
desc:
Clean up the temp file.
Deletes the backing temporary file.

name: fieldName
desc: Name of the multipart field that carried the upload.

name: filename
desc: Original filename reported by the client, if any.

name: length
desc: Number of bytes written to the temporary file.

name: openRead
desc: Read the file as a stream (do not delete the temp file until done).

name: path
desc: Path to the temp file (if you need to move/rename it).

name: readAsBytes
desc: Convenience to read all bytes (only if the file is reasonably small).

name: catchTopLevelErrors
desc: Runs callback while ensuring asynchronous errors are reported via onError.

name: handleRequest
desc: Wraps an incoming request with Ctx and executes the application handler.

name: logger
desc: Returns middleware that logs request and response information.

name: loggerWithConfig
desc: Returns middleware that logs request and response information using config.

name: serve
desc: Starts an HttpServer wired to the provided handler.

name: serveRequests
desc: Consumes the stream of requests and forwards each to handler.
